name: Rapedes
overview: Rapedes is in fact a classic 'Centipede'. Your ship may move left and right as well as up and down to about one-third the screen height. There are green mushrooms which erode with four shots, a large spider and snail, red mushrooms and, as the level of play gets higher, falling centipede segments. The centipede itself is made of alternating blue and yellow circles.
